title: NO CREDIT BAD CREDIT O.K.
app_fee: $75 application fee per adult & $300 holding fee
posting_body: ['Dear Applicant,', 'Come and visit us at Tahiti Gardens Apartments our nice and quiet community located near Walmart, Publix, Walgreens ,Burlington factory, Ross and I-95 and turnpike.', '24/7 surveillance cameras, pool, Grilling area, playground and newly added media room.', 'Amenities: 24/7 Security surveillance cameras, Sparking swimming pool, grilling area, Playground, and newly added media room.', 'We have 1 bedroom and 2 bedrooms Apartments:', 'Our 1 bedroom start at $1695.00', 'Our 2 bedrooms 1 bath start at $2025.00', 'Our 2 bedrooms 2 baths start at $2250.00', '*Water/Sewer/Trash/pest Control Included*', 'Security Deposit starts at $800.00 (Based on Credit)', 'Our application fee is $75.00 per person', 'There is a $300 holding fee (Refundable).', 'Pet Friendly ask us about our restrictions.', 'For more information please contact our office.', '3460 NW 50th Avenue #B-105', 'Lauderdale Lakes Fl 33319']
